JMP.name: Jump to Another Location
JMP.description: Sets the program counter to the address specified by the operand.

JSR.name: Jump to Subroutine
JSR.description: The JSR instruction pushes the address (minus one) of the return point on to the stack and then sets the program counter to the target memory address.

RTS.name: Return from Subroutine
RTS.description: The RTS instruction is used at the end of a subroutine to return to the calling routine. It pulls the program counter (minus one) from the stack.
